snippet: While the most exciting item of the day was Jason Bay's separation from the Mets, general managers spent the majority of Wednesday's meetings debating possible rule modifications to instant replay and September call-ups.
abstract: While the most exciting item of the day was Jason Bay's separation from the Mets, general managers spent the majority of Wednesday's meetings debating possible rule modifications to instant replay and September call-ups.

headline.main: General Managers Looking at Replays and Call-Ups
